titleStmt.title: By the Mayor. Whereas the slow comming in of the moneys upon the ordinance of Parliament of the sixteenth of October last for the releif of Ireland, ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor.
Atkins, Thomas, Sir.

notesStmt.note: Title from heading and first lines of text.
Signed at end: Thomas Atkin Mayor.
Dated at end: Old-Iury London, 20 of June, 1645.
A request to the ministers and collectors of the churches in London to urge the more rapid contribution of money for the relief of Ireland.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
